data.title: Joaquin Phoenix
data.meta_description: Joaquin Phoenix (b. October 28, 1974) is an American actor who portrayed Arthur Fleck in Joker and its upcoming sequel, Joker: Folie à Deux. Pictured: Phoenix as Arthur Fleck from Joker Joaquin Phoenix is an American character actor known for playing dark and eccentric characters in independent...
data.text:
Joaquin Phoenix (b. October 28, 1974) is an American actor who portrayed Arthur Fleck in Joker and its upcoming sequel, Joker: Folie à Deux.

Pictured: Phoenix as Arthur Fleck from Joker

Professional History

Joaquin Phoenix is an American character actor known for playing dark and eccentric characters in independent films. Some of his most recognizable roles include Commodus in Gladiator, Merrill Hess in Signs, Theodore Thwombly in Her, and Doc Sportello in Inherent Vice.

In 2019, Phoenix starred as Arthur Fleck in Todd Phillips' psychological thriller film Joker, loosely based on the iconic DC Comics villain. The film was a massive commercial hit, becoming one of the highest grossing films of all time, and despite polarizing critical reactions, Phoenix's performance gained widespread acclaim, winning him Best Actor at the 92nd Academy Awards. Phoenix is set to reprise the role for in the upcoming sequel, Joker: Folie à Deux, which is currently in post-production.
